songs.title: A Sky Full of Stars (Hardwell Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Cause you're a sky
Cause you're a sky full of stars
I'm going to give you my heart
Cause you're a sky
Cause you're a sky full of stars
And cause you light up the path

[Hook 1]
I don't care
Go on and tear me apart
I don't care if you do
Cause in a sky
Cause in a sky full of stars
I think I saw you

[Hook 2]
Cause in a sky
Cause in a sky full of stars
I think I saw you

[Outro]
So sky
You're a sky full of stars
Such heavenly view
You're such a heavenly view
(yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
